attributes.action: Set a Definite Cap on Tuition Fees of £3000 per year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hate unfair hypocritical tuition fees like any student but unfortunately they seem to be here to stay. But I will say they should be capped at £3000 a year and NOT under any circumstances raised to ridiculous limits like £10,000 like some university leaders want. This would price most people out of higher education and leave university as an option only to the rich.
